comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT of Dec 10, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70B10FD3E5A1573... and of Dec 22, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F4091EF7395D16738... Banks was a witness before the Thompson Legislative Committee. See notes under for more on the investigation.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: He was General Manager of the Northwestern Equipment Company. See also The sun., December 22, 1915, Page 14, column 2

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for connecting Banks to the Thompson Committee.  We'll add some of the information to this record the next time we update.
